record.title: ELECTION OF CLERK OF THE HOUSE, SERGEANT AT ARMS, CHIEF ADMINISTRATIVE OFFICER AND CHAPLAIN

speaking.paragraph: Madam Speaker, I offer a privileged resolution (H. Res. 1) and ask for its immediate consideration.

record.narrative: The Clerk read the resolution, as follows:

speaking.paragraph: Madam Speaker, I yield to the gentleman from Florida (Mr. Putnam) for the purpose of offering an amendment.

Madam Speaker, I have an amendment to the resolution, but before offering the amendment, I request that there be a division of the question on the resolution so that we may have a separate vote on the Chaplain.

record.chair: The question is on the amendment offered by the gentleman from Florida (Mr. Putnam).
